name: It's Either Them or us
description:
"But lately all the roots from your garden have grown, They cut through my skin, they broke my heart and all I have left are bones."

Made during Malaga Jam Weekend 15 in February 2023, by:
Beicoli - Josyan - Sergio "Pikas" - Marc Sureda - Edu Verz - Ivan Papiol - Bibiki

Lyrics: 

Long ago all I wanted was to build a home

but I didn't know how to do it so I just hoped

Then you came

I let you plant the seeds of your fears 

let you come and water them for years and then we waited

But lately all the roots from your garden have grown

they have grown

They cut through my skin, they broke my heart

and all I have left are bones

bones

So take them 

and build yourself a home

With all my tears I could make rivers and seas

Use my last breath to be the summer breeze

And take my eyes, make with them two shiny stars

They will guide you when everything else is dark

But lately all the roots from your garden have grown

they have grown

They cut through my skin, they broke my heart

and all I have left are bones

bones

So take them 

and build yourself a home

Please just take them

and build yourself a home

Please take them

and build yourself a home
